  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Electrical Engineer Job at Sumal Foods Limited",
  "description": "Sumal Foods Limited is a name entirely synonymous with quality and is highly committed to maintaining its moral beliefs. The business is known for the high quality biscuits, chewing gum, and toffees it manufactures under the Sumal Foods group; as well as for a number of leading companies under their own names Yalefoods and Vitalfoods.

We are recruiting to fill the positions below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Electrical Engineer

Job Location:&nbsp;Ring Road, Ibadan - Oyo

Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess relevant qualifications and experience.


Method of Application
Interested candidates should send their Curriculum Vitae to:&nbsp;grouphrm@sumalfoods.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note:&nbsp;Only shortlisted applicants will be invited for interviews.",
  "datePosted": "2025-07-09",
  "validThrough": "2025-08-08",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Sumal Foods Limited"
  },

      "addressCountry": "NG"

Electrical Engineer Job at Sumal Foods Limited




        
    

        
        Sumal Foods Limited is a name entirely synonymous with quality and is highly committed to maintaining its moral beliefs. The business is known for the high quality biscuits, chewing gum, and toffees it manufactures under the Sumal Foods group; as well as for a number of leading companies under their own names Yalefoods and Vitalfoods.

We are recruiting to fill the positions below:

Job Position: Electrical Engineer

Job Location: Ring Road, Ibadan - Oyo

Requirements
     

            
    




	Interested candidates should possess relevant qualifications and experience.


Method of Application
Interested candidates should send their Curriculum Vitae to: grouphrm@sumalfoods.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: Only shortlisted applicants will be invited for interviews.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Mall Manager Job at Residency Hotel Limited",
  "description": "Residency Hotel Limited is one of the leading hospitality companies in Nigeria, with over 10 branches across the nation and more than 30 years in the industry.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Mall Manager
Job Location:&nbsp;Guzape, Abuja
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are looking for someone experienced in Management skill to work with us.
	He/she will be in charge of managing our new mall located in Guzape Abuja.
	We are looking for talented individuals with customer service, sales &amp; marketing background in sales and management industry to work in a management position.


Requirements


	Selected candidates must have a maximum of 10 years of experience in the sales and customer service relation and management role.
	Minimum of 3/5 years&rsquo; previous experience as a manager
	Selected candidates must have a minimum of an HND degree
	Selected candidates will take full responsibility for the operations of the mall, including ensuring zero revenue leakages and theft.
	Selected candidates will agree to meet and exceed the quarterly target.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;miraclenwodo@icloud.com&nbsp;using &quot;Manager&quot; as the subject of the email.

Note:&nbsp;For Inquiries, send a WhatsApp message to:&nbsp;09037925906.",
  "datePosted": "2025-07-09",
  "validThrough": "4400-07-09",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Residency hotel"
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",
    "address": {
      "@type": "PostalAddress",
      "addressLocality": "Abuja",
      "addressCountry": "NG"
    }
  },
  "identifier": {
    "@type": "PropertyValue",
    "name": "",
    "value": "184034"
  },
  "baseSalary": {
    "@type": "MonetaryAmount",
    "currency": "NGN",
    "value": {
      "@type": "QuantitativeValue",
      "minValue": 0,
      "maxValue": 0,
      "unitText": "MONTH"
    }
  }
}



Mall Manager Job at Residency Hotel Limited




        
    

        
        Residency Hotel Limited is one of the leading hospitality companies in Nigeria, with over 10 branches across the nation and more than 30 years in the industry.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Mall Manager
Job Location: Guzape, Abuja
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are looking for someone experienced in Management skill to work with us.
	He/she will be in charge of managing our new mall located in Guzape Abuja.
	We are looking for talented individuals with customer service, sales & marketing background in sales and management industry to work in a management position.


Requirements


	Selected candidates must have a maximum of 10 years of experience in the sales and customer service relation and management role.
	Minimum of 3/5 years’ previous experience as a manager
	Selected candidates must have a minimum of an HND degree
	Selected candidates will take full responsibility for the operations of the mall, including ensuring zero revenue leakages and theft.
	Selected candidates will agree to meet and exceed the quarterly target.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: miraclenwodo@icloud.com using "Manager" as the subject of the email.

Note: For Inquiries, send a WhatsApp message to: 09037925906.    

    

        Click here to Apply

  "title": "Wholesales Executive Job at Bogo Beverage Limited",
  "description": "Bogo Beverage Limited is a young and dynamic total manufacturing, distribution and marketing of quality beverage company, with a strong entrepreneurial spirit and growth mindset. We are determined to dominate the beverage sector with our quality brands, apt commercial acumen and cognate experience of the Nigerian consumers and Africa

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Wholesales Executive
Job Locations:&nbsp;Adamawa, Borno and Kano

Job Summary


	We are seeking a results-driven and experienced Wholesale Executive to manage and grow our wholesale distribution network across the Northern region specifically - Borno, Adamawa, and Kano.
	The ideal candidate must have a strong background in wholesale operations within the wine and beverage industry, excellent territorial knowledge of the region, and the ability to build and maintain strong distributor relationships.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and execute strategic plans to drive wholesale sales in assigned territories.
	Manage relationships with wholesalers, distributors, and key trade partners.
	Ensure proper coverage, visibility, and availability of all products across channels.
	Monitor sales performance, market trends, and competitor activities within the region.
	Conduct regular market visits to supervise execution and identify growth opportunities.
	Manage stock levels and ensure timely order placement and delivery.
	Provide feedback and field reports to the Regional Sales Manager.
	Train and support trade partners on product knowledge and brand guidelines.


Requirements


	Minimum of OND/HND/Bachelor&#39;s Degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or related field.
	Minimum of 3 years of experience in wholesale sales, preferably in the wine and beverages industry.
	Must reside in either Borno, Adamawa, or Kano.
	Must own a personal car and possess a valid driver&rsquo;s license.
	Strong negotiation, communication, and interpersonal skills.- Ability to work independently without supervision.
	Excellent knowledge of the Northern market terrain and trade structure.


Method of Aplication
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume to:&nbsp;careers.bogo@outlook.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

Wholesales Executive Job at Bogo Beverage Limited




        
    

        
        Bogo Beverage Limited is a young and dynamic total manufacturing, distribution and marketing of quality beverage company, with a strong entrepreneurial spirit and growth mindset. We are determined to dominate the beverage sector with our quality brands, apt commercial acumen and cognate experience of the Nigerian consumers and Africa

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Wholesales Executive
Job Locations: Adamawa, Borno and Kano

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are seeking a results-driven and experienced Wholesale Executive to manage and grow our wholesale distribution network across the Northern region specifically - Borno, Adamawa, and Kano.
	The ideal candidate must have a strong background in wholesale operations within the wine and beverage industry, excellent territorial knowledge of the region, and the ability to build and maintain strong distributor relationships.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and execute strategic plans to drive wholesale sales in assigned territories.
	Manage relationships with wholesalers, distributors, and key trade partners.
	Ensure proper coverage, visibility, and availability of all products across channels.
	Monitor sales performance, market trends, and competitor activities within the region.
	Conduct regular market visits to supervise execution and identify growth opportunities.
	Manage stock levels and ensure timely order placement and delivery.
	Provide feedback and field reports to the Regional Sales Manager.
	Train and support trade partners on product knowledge and brand guidelines.


Requirements


	Minimum of OND/HND/Bachelor's Degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or related field.
	Minimum of 3 years of experience in wholesale sales, preferably in the wine and beverages industry.
	Must reside in either Borno, Adamawa, or Kano.
	Must own a personal car and possess a valid driver’s license.
	Strong negotiation, communication, and interpersonal skills.- Ability to work independently without supervision.
	Excellent knowledge of the Northern market terrain and trade structure.


Method of Aplication
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume to: careers.bogo@outlook.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
